explains: n. 市民，城镇居民；公民，国民
wordGroup: corporate citizen 企业公民；公司公民
fellow citizen 各位公民；同胞
global citizen 世界公民；全球公民
second-class citizen 次等公民 , 二等公民

sentences.en: She's Italian by birth but is now an Australian citizen.
sentences.cn: 她生于意大利，但现在是澳大利亚公民。

sentences.en: I don't appreciate being treated like a second-class citizen.
sentences.cn: 我不愿被人当作二等公民。
